channel.title: Disney on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Disney on FinanClub

item.title: DIS
item.description: score:73 Chances: Disney stock is soaring to a 52-week high driven by the booming streaming industry and the company’s plans to achieve streaming profitability by year’s end. Investors are bullish on Disney stock due to moderated streaming losses and the joint sports streaming venture with valuable sports content.
